title: TraderStat
author: TraderStat
content: 📍 Sometimes provider signals are seen only as ideas for your own trading, in today’s case I would give up even that thought — RlcTrading💠 The trader publishes 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗲𝘅 ideas💠 4 years on the site with >7000 rating💠 521 followers and 910 ideas on TV💠 We checked 𝟮𝟬𝟮 ideas of which 𝟱𝟯 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸𝗲𝗱💠 Idea accuracy 𝟮𝟲%🔴 Total result for checked ideas -𝟰𝟳𝟬𝟳 𝗽𝗶𝗽𝘀📊 Brief statistics - https://imageup.ru/img178/4051102/rlctrading.jpg📒 All statistics - https://traderstat.com/trader/RlcTradingBe smart! Check first, then use 😉🗣 Chat of our community - https://t.me/+TYzp-TCiz9U4YjEy💻 Website - http://TraderStat.com✈️ Our Telegram - @TraderStatistic

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: TraderStat on October 24, 2022, 10:40:15 AM💻 Website - http://TraderStat.comIf you are looking to advertise the service on the forum then best start will be to buy a copper membership and update this ann with a good design.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on October 24, 2022, 12:33:04 PMIs 26% supposed to be good accuracy percentage?Obviously it's so bad, Not so many traders would even love the idea of going below 50%OP is trying to advertise a site that shows statistics and the accuracy of different "signal providers" so in the post he gave an example of a single provider that has a number of followers but his stats are so bad.

comments.author: TraderStat
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on October 24, 2022, 11:43:16 AMQuote from: TraderStat on October 24, 2022, 10:40:15 AM💻 Website - http://TraderStat.comIf you are looking to advertise the service on the forum then best start will be to buy a copper membership and update this ann with a good design. For now, we are only testing this platform and we do not publish fully advertising publications, but only the results of some of our checks with links to our resources. We will also soon make publications of other formats without our promotional materials. But thank you for the advice

comments.author: TraderStat
comments.body: Quote from: ETFbitcoin on October 24, 2022, 12:33:04 PMQuote from: TraderStat on October 24, 2022, 10:40:15 AM💠 Idea accuracy 𝟮𝟲%Is 26% supposed to be good accuracy percentage?No, it's not good; it's even lower than the average values we see in our work. 50% as the example above is also quite unusual values, which are rarely found, because exactly the signal gives a more objective assessment together with the calculation of the average risk-to-reward ratio. Therefore, with 30% accuracy a trader can be both profitable and unprofitable. I once wrote an article on the dependence of accuracy and RRR, I will publish it on this site soon.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: It's against the forum rules to make multiple posts in a row, taking about the two posts in a row above. You can answer more than our members in a single post.Quote from: TraderStat on October 25, 2022, 10:35:24 PMBut thank you for the advice  You are welcome.
